channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: Power Up Pride
item.content:encoded:
Celebrate PRIDE all month long with the all-new Power Up PRIDE Bundle! This curated collection features amazing games that positively portray LGBTQIA+ themes and characters. On top of that, these titles are a lot of fun to play. Dive into great games like Heart of the Woods, Kindred Spirits, Echoes of the Plum Grove, and more. Pay what you want and help support Xperience Studios with your purchase!

Kindred Spirits On The Roof is intended for mature audiences. Themes include partial nudity, suggestive situations and themes, as well as references to sexual acts in casual conversation for comedic effect. This game contains no explicit sexual or pornographic content, and all characters depicted are above the age of 18. User discretion is advised.

item.title: Badass Brawlers
item.content:encoded: Challenge yourself and show your friends who's boss with the all-new Badass Brawlers Bundle! Experience a retro classic with a fresh coat of paint in Double Dragon Neon, dive into an all-new beat-’em-up adventure in River City Girls 2, suplex skyscraper-sized Kaiju in Dawn of the Monsters, and more. Play badass brawlers with our latest game bundle and help support SpecialEffect with your purchase!
